website_summaries.verdict: Chose it if you like its 2-way capabilities for legs; otherwise go with the Halo if you want top quality.
pros: A versatile model with a patented leg-in or leg-out design
Has quiet-to-close snaps and Velcro for a safe, secure fit
cons: Our testers noted that the Halo swaddle is slightly better made, and comes at a lower price

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Never even thought about doing this with our first child, but if one of your babes is a little thrasher and keeps themselves up then this is for you. Our baby is two months old and when swaddled with this will sleep through the night for about 7-10 hours !!! I know times will differ with different baby’s but honestly once the kid is out she stays out till the morning. The swaddle is easy to use with the use of the zipper and the Velcro for those of us that can’t do the old fashion way. Five stars buy it !
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Velcro failed after only a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this swaddle for my newborn and loved it at first. Unfortunately after only a month the Velcro on the middle flap started to fail and would no longer stick. She was able to wiggle enough to make the middle flap come undone and it landed on her face. Thankfully I was sitting right next to her when it happened and I quickly removed the swaddle. I tried to reach out to the company but they never bothered to contact me back. For $30 I expected it to last longer than a month!
customer_reviews.author: sdfdsfsdaf

customer_reviews.title: I love this line!
customer_reviews.text: I originally order my first embe swaddle when my little one hated having her legs confined, she would even kick and twist to pop them out of footie pajama buttons! I loved it so much that it’s now one of my go-to baby shower gifts especially when the baby is due in the summer! Great customer service and a fun Instagram account to follow as well.
customer_reviews.author: RJansen

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. I can change her diaper at night without unswaddling her. Also like the flexibility of leaving the legs out when it’s warm out.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: our baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: our 6 week old baby girl sleeps nice and comfy in her swaddle blanket. I highly recommend it because, the first night we wrapped her in the swaddle blanket she slept 3 hours straight. :) she sleeps and we sleep, so new parents out there consider this blanket and you will see how it hugs baby and sleep longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great swaddle design!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this sleep sack and falls and stays asleep. It’s perfect for her to be swaddled and still get to stretch her legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 swaddle no escaping! Slept thru ngt!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight soft material. Strong Velcro so Houdini baby was not able to escape. She has slept peacefully thru the ngt ever since I started using this swaddle. A++
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: very useful. My daughter used this to sleep and rarely cried. I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Jiantgsy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not for our tiny wizard.
customer_reviews.text: The material and colors were beautiful! Unfortunately my Houdini baby was escaping it before I even laid her down. She’s a long little beanpole (94th % in height but only 40th% in weight) so the zipper section was pretty useless for us and there was no way to keep her tucked in while getting the Velcro just so in order to keep her arms down. It was a two person job and still didn’t work for us! But if you have a sweet lil chunky baby, I can see how this would be great! We ended up with the overpriced but highly effective Ollie swaddle ultimately.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: A swaddle that has it all
customer_reviews.text: This is our third baby, and I now know how much swaddling can affect baby's sleep (and parent’s sleep!). I love this swaddle. We had the Olli Swaddle with our second and I didn’t think it could get any better. I’m glad I was wrong! I love that you can swaddle legs out, and when you do so you secure the bottom with little snaps that don’t make any noise when you have to diaper change. I feel like the price point is very reasonable also. And it doesn’t hurt that you can get it in two days with Prime and can be on your way to better sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Steph Labenski

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my baby was 5 weeks old & he could already wriggle his hands all the way up to his face regardless of how snug I made it. The Velcro is really loud & a bit of a hassle to get undone. The fact that it has both a zipper & Velcro is annoying. Too much work for a swaddle. It swaddles your baby yes, but no I would NOT recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Macey

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and concept of this swaddle. It has worked well, I like the front closure. It is a tad bit too small for my 1 month old and rides up on his neck so the zipper is a potential problem there, however as he gets bigger this will not be a problem. He is currently 7 pounds. The rear velcro closure makes the swaddle look great when baby is laying down, but can be a fuss when trying to get him out and yes upset. Overall I would buy more of these, just cant afford it!
customer_reviews.author: Suphomie

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite swaddle!! Room to grow without drowning in fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far our favorite swaddle! Before our baby was born we bought a variety of swaddles and swaddle blankets including this one; we end up using this one everytime. So much so we have ended up purchasing three more to use as they become dirty because he uses it daily. The color is great and holds up to washings well. The fabric is soft and breathable. Our son was a preemie and the adjustability is perfect. Fit in it right away with plenty of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: pixipince

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle, easy to use, diaper changes without unwrapping
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 months and still sleeps in these every night. We get a full 9 hours (with two feedings in between) when she is swaddled in this. Love that we can change her without unwrapping the whole thing too! Love love love this!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Zeier

customer_reviews.title: So good for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these wraps for my older child and loved it enough to buy another for my newborn. It is easy enough to put on that my husband can do it and I know my baby is swaddled good enough that he’ll sleep a long sleep. I will say it doesn’t work as good once they get a bit older because my daughter got strong enough to lift her arms and bunch the band up by her face so her hands were free.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly White

customer_reviews.title: Hip Brace Friendly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has an intense startle reflex and needs to be swaddled to get a decent stretch of sleep. At 5 weeks she had to start wearing a hip brace. None of our swaddles fit her anymore. I came across this one on Instagram and ordered on Amazon. We were able to swaddle her with her legs out and around her brace. It’s the only one I found that fit our needs. The fabric is soft and stretchy and washed well. She no longer has the brace but we’re still using the swaddle with her legs in. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AskHaley

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I like this swaddle, the fabric is soft and has a good amount of stretch but I do not understand how they are claiming you can change a diaper without unswaddling...entirely not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color options and the baby enjoys the swaddle! Our babe is on the smaller end so it takes some maneuvering to prevent fabric from bunching up near his mouth, but overall love for this swaddle! It’s our third baby but first summer baby and we needed a swaddle that fit our newborn that was lightweight and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This has made our newborn sleep through the night!
customer_reviews.text: We started using this with our one month old baby and it has been amazing. It’s the only swaddle that he stays in all night and doesn’t wiggle out of. Since using it, he’s sleeping so much better! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marra

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle for strong babies
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this! You can decide the tightness with the velcro. She loves to be swaddled right and this allows for that! Also keeps her little hands from wiggling out which other swaddles we’ve tried can’t do. She’s a strong girl and any other swaddle her hands come out and wake her up.
customer_reviews.author: Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle for a strong baby
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this! You can decide the tightness with the velcro. She loves to be swaddled right and this allows for that! Also keeps her little hands from wiggling out which other swaddles we’ve tried can’t do. She’s a strong girl and any other swaddle her hands come out and wake her up.
customer_reviews.author: Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Love these swaddles
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these swaddles at our shower and used it in the hospital with our little for the first time and loved it! It took a hot minute to figure it out but it kept our baby secure and she slept great with it. It was also nice to just unsnap the bottom piece and unwrap her legs to change her diaper without having to fully unwrap her. We haven't used the legs out way yet, but I like having that option.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Pullmann

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: New baby isn’t here yet, but I can’t wait to use this swaddle! The strategy of it is genius and the fabric and color are gorgeous. Because of the fit I’m a little sad that I won’t be able to use it for all that long, but if we like it I’ll definitely be buying the next size up as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lfur

customer_reviews.title: Different than the solid color swaddle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swaddle along with on of the solid colored ones. The solid color one is amazing, no complaints at all. For some reason this striped one seems and little bigger and no matter how much I tighten this swaddle my son still manages to get his hands up by his face and then starts crying from being uncomfortable. I will probably use it again once he gets a little bigger because I do love this brand over all.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Legs out swaddle works great with Pavlik harness
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was recently diagnosed with hip dysplasia and has to wear a Pavlik harness. We were desperate to find a way to swaddle her legs out and this swaddle has been a life saver. Not only does it work great with her harness but she is actually sleeping for longer stretches of time than she was before. The swaddle fits our 2 month old well with a soft and strong fabric. I will buying the transitional swaddle soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well, I thought Houdini’s couldn’t get out... my 6 week old sure could. He’s now 10 weeks and is so uncomfortable in this swaddle. Not sure why 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Katie Keys

customer_reviews.title: Great - but didn't receive the pattern I ordered
customer_reviews.text: While I like the swaddle I was pretty disappointed when I ordered the pink giraffe swaddle and received the pink stripe swaddle. I understand that a swaddle is a swaddle and the baby doesn't care, but it's not great when you don't receive exactly what you paid for. Other than that, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Great, short-term sleep option.
customer_reviews.text: Baby loved this for 1 month. Immediately calmed and was able to fall asleep. However, the shoulders were narrow causing it to ride up a bit, and it fit much more snugly than another embe ordered in the same size in a different color...not sure why. Our child did NOT like the embe with the legs out, so we had to stop using it after she outgrew the length of the sack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clubfoot approved
customer_reviews.text: Works great for clubfoot babies, with the casting I was able to use some of my other brand swaddles j had from my older son but this was a must have for the boots and bar phase. Also much easier than the other brands for diaper changes. I like to readjust the Velcro once I’m holding him to get it tighter.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Saver!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is a wild child and without being swaddled she will wake herself up moving. This swaddle is easy to use, light weight and great quality. We purchased 3 after receiving one as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kachelhoffer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this swaddle!
customer_reviews.text: Really great swaddle and my baby loves it. My only complaint is that it shrank... so she barely fits in it at 10.5 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great swaddle sack.
customer_reviews.text: Overall we love this swaddle sack. Our baby stays asleep longer when he wears it. My only concern is that the material near the neck has a tendency of bunching up and gets a little too close to his mouth and nose. You have to make sure it’s pretty tight to avoid this!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle out there.
customer_reviews.text: We love these swaddlers. It's pretty much the only thing that gets my baby to sleep. We had to buy more because sometimes it has to be washed. It's also amazing because he sleeps through night time diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: L K Kono

customer_reviews.title: I am able to sleep better knowing this swaddle will not ride up and cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I am able to sleep better knowing this swaddle will not ride up and cover the nose/mouth. Love this swaddle!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST swaddle I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST swaddle I have ever had. My kids wanted to escape every other swaddles I put them in, but this one they liked! It's amazing design makes it super easy to use and to get babies in. I will continue to refer this product to friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby item!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this swaddle! We got ours last week and that next morning I ordered another one! We got this because our little one has hip problems and needs to be in a hip safe swaddle. So easy to use and my strong girl couldn’t break out of it!! Yay!! The colors are so pretty as well! So obsessed and will be telling all my mommy to be friends about this must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Studer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous swaddle for those late night latches!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fit, super comfortable and works like a charm! This is our second embe and it’s such a timesaver for those midnight hour re-swaddles!
customer_reviews.author: Bahahahah

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Baby screamed when I attempted to put this on. He is only 11 pounds and this was sooo tight! Couldn’t make it work and returned. Needs the transitional version if he were to use.
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: By far my fav specially if your baby loves to self sooth with there own hands
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my best friend for the baby shower and she is so excited to use it! So soft and the color is olive green perfect! I will keep this in mind for another baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: This swaddle is soft and seems like it will be easy to use! I’ll update when the baby arrives!
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: The best swaddler! Got a few of these as they beat any out there. They keep the baby cozy, tight enough and do not unravel. Unparallel to any type of Velcro swaddle you find at Target, Buy Buy Baby. Definitely recommend. This makes my top purchase of must haves if you have a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Swaddle
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is cheap and comes undone from the top making it hard to get baby out. The swaddle part is also not very tight for my newborn but I think he will grow into it. Overall I do like it and use it because the fabric doesn’t bunch at the top like others and it’s lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Fausette

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE how easy and useful this swaddle is. It’s extremely safe for newborns and even prevents hip dysplasia. The color is a rust/orange and can be used for either gender!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Lunardi

customer_reviews.title: The best swaddle! I've tried them all
customer_reviews.text: The best swaddle! I've tried them all. I put my daughter to bed at night in a Velcro swaddle so the muslin wraps don't get loose in her cradle, and she's become a bit of a Houdini getting out of them all eventually waking her throughout the night, and fights me when I'm wrapping her too. This one goes on so easy, and stays on nice all night. I don't worry about it shimmying up around her neck or over her mouth either. Perfect swaddle!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this swaddle. My baby sleeps much better through the night with this, it’s light weight and material is soft! I will absolutely be buying more of their swaddles for my little guy
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic swaddle with slight annoyances
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and little one sleeps soundly; however it is a bit of a lengthy process to get baby out compared to other swaddles for middle of the night changes. Otherwise, material is soft and comfy and provides a safe and tight swaddle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this swaddle. My baby sleeps soundly at night and loves the comfort of it. I am looking forward to buying the transitional swaddle soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swaddle, color ran
customer_reviews.text: Love this swaddle but color ran in the wash and I washed on cold
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell
customer_reviews.text: The fabric has some kind of chemical smell that I had to wash several times to get rid of. Not only that, it’s annoying how the closure is made of. It makes a lot of noise getting your baby in and out in the middle of night for diaper change. I end up not using in the end.
customer_reviews.author: jacque

customer_reviews.title: Great swaddle for babies with clubfoot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swaddle to use with my baby who has a clubfoot during the bracing phase. I like the versatility of this swaddle, but the zipper feels a little cheap and can be a hard to fasten. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Helps with getting the little one to sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swaddle! My little one cannot get out of this at all. With this swaddle plus his Dock A Tot, he’s been getting 3-4 hours of sleep a night. We love it so much we bought another one for back up.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! He sleeps longer with it on!!
customer_reviews.author: lourdes falcon

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap but too HOT
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves this wrap, however, he gets really hot. Wish the fabric was more breathable then I would totally use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use product with comfort for baby! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little confusing to use but I love the concept of this swaddle. My baby sleeps very comfortably and it’s light weight. Perfect for summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Medel Bencito

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, seems easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my baby due end of july so I haven't used it on him yet, however it does seem like it is easy to use. It came with an instruction card that had pictures on how to use. I'm excited to try to swaddle baby boy soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Topf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing so easy to use and none of the confusion from using a blanket to swaddle haha
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Faded color streaks
customer_reviews.text: Horrible faded lines on the whole thing. Looks a bit plush and luxurious online but material is thin and not very soft cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Dhirendra

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle ever
customer_reviews.text: Eat swaddle ever! Wish I had known about it months ago. Finally my son can’t escape and was asleep within minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure swaddle!
customer_reviews.text: This swaddle is great! It really makes it impossible for my little houdini to get out. I also love the neutral color- perfect for boys or girls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Best swaddle ever I wish I had these with my first kid
customer_reviews.author: Ireland vassallo

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: So amazing that as soon as I got it I ordered another one. My 6week old is sleeping through the night!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Studer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use swaddle
customer_reviews.text: If you are one of the mom’s who find it hard to use a traditional swaddle, this is the swaddle for you then. Easy to use and wash.
customer_reviews.author: H_kaur

customer_reviews.title: Secure swaddle
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product a lot because it was the only swaddle that is secure for Houdini kids. I did return it only because my little one will only swaddle with arms up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son has clubfeet and this was perfect for his legs out swaddling❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle out there
customer_reviews.text: Love that I cao zip them up and snap it so they can't get out it has worked perfect! my 3 month old loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not the swaddle for us
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is great, I would not recommend this product. It says one size but fit a bit loose on my baby, who is about 9lbs. As she's a squirmy little thing, the fabric rode up and partially covered her nose/mouth. I'm sticking with the Halo sleep sack instead!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's too much work. Zipper, snaps, Velcro. If you're try to be quick and quiet during a 2am feeding this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Borealis

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 7 weeks old and started breaking out of all swaddles. We were using the Halo swaddle and Swaddle Me and she would get her arms out and/or get the fabric up around her mouth and nose, which is 1. dangerous and 2. would wake her up. Once we got the Embe swaddle she slept 9 hours the first night and 8 hours the second because she couldn’t get her arms out and the fabric didn’t (and can’t) ride up to her face. Definitely a game changer for us and would highly recommend! Super easy to use and high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every parent must have!
customer_reviews.text: The only swaddle that my son likes! He is currently one week old and when we were in the hospital, I brought along my embe swaddle. Once we wrapped him up, he immediately fell asleep and was calm. Even the nurses were amazed at it! I love how easy it is to wrap babies up and gives me peace of mind at night when he is sleeping that he won’t break free!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline DeLage

customer_reviews.title: Embe swaddle
customer_reviews.text: I got this swaddle directly through embe’s website, but it has been amazing so far! The shipping was super fast, the customer service is great, and my favorite part - this swaddle is really soft and certified as hip-healthy. I have a genetic skeletal dysplasia that my children are likely to inherit, so knowing that the embe swaddles are the best for their joints is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn James

customer_reviews.title: Secure swaddle
customer_reviews.text: I just received this swaddle in the mail this week, but so far we’ve loved it. My baby sleeps better because she isn’t able to get her hands free. We have tried other wearable blankets but somehow she can break out of them. Not this one. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because the zipper seems like it is cheaply made. Hopefully it’ll hold up to being zipped and unzipped multiple times per day.
customer_reviews.author: de Armas

customer_reviews.title: Yes - you DO need one!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our embe swaddle! We had tried several others for our girl, and she always seemed uncomfortable, as new parents we felt guilty putting her in them! But if we didn’t swaddle her, she was waking herself up with her hands! This swaddle solves all of those issues! She is never upset when we wrap her up, it doesn’t ride up in her face, it’s by far the softest and strongest swaddle we’ve purchased (and sadly we have purchased quite a few) and she’s sleeping through the night at 2.5 months, HALLELUJAH! We suggest embe to all baby parents in our life!
customer_reviews.author: ASram

customer_reviews.title: This is the best swaddle I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swaddle I have ever used. I'm on my 4th baby and have gone through a few different ones. She felt safe and well contained. She was never able to break her arms out and I didn't have to worry about the fabric gathering up around her face. I cannot recommend this enough!! Our girl started sleeping through the night not long after we began using it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect modern baby swaddle!
customer_reviews.text: This swaddle is perfect! It’s just what I was looking for in a swaddle. I love the two way swaddle option since I’m having a summer baby I can either swaddle legs in or out to let baby adjust to temperature. The colors are so neutral and beautiful, I love love that with this specific swaddle I don’t have to fully undress baby for middle of the night diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: Lunamommyvlogs

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite nap time swaddle
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a lot of swaddles and this is one of two that our 4 month old hasn't been able to bust out of. Not even the NICU nurses with their pro-level swaddling could contain our strong girl. I also love that we can swaddle her with her legs out, which is our go-to for nap time in the hot summer days. It's soft, easy to use, and I love that our daughter is safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Throw all other swaddles away!
customer_reviews.text: We had got two swaddles for our newborn and he hated them, always pulling the wrap peice around his face. The Embe swaddle is perfect, holds in place perectly and is a MUST have for a good night’s rest. We got two because if one got dirty during the night, we would be sleepless without our backup.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Tucked in Tightly for Sound Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My son was born in the summer so when we swaddled him it always got too hot. Embe swaddle's leg out option made my son much more comfortable in the summer heat. With other swaddles it was always easy for him to break free from wiggling around but with Embe swaddle he was tucked in tightly and got good sleep. I love it so much I have gifted it to several friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lu

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this swaddle! My baby will break her arms free from any traditional swaddle. This swaddle was a game changer for us! Since using it, our baby went from waking up every two hours on the dot to sleeping stretches of 4 to 6 hours! The extra sleep helps so much and she’s getting better quality sleep when swaddled in this! I love the versatility of being able to have legs in or out as well!
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Pigford

customer_reviews.title: Love these swaddles
customer_reviews.text: I love Embe’ swaddle. We used the starter swaddles for the past couple of months, and now we are graduating to the 2-way swaddle out! The new solid colors available on their website are beautiful! I love the rust. My baby sleeps incredibly well in the night with no fussing when we use this swaddle. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this swaddle
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this swaddle ! First of all it's so so adorable ! Second my baby sleeps so good through the night with it. It fits nice & snug . Not to tight but just perfect so she doesnt escape it ! My baby girl is already almost 4 months & still sleeps in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anton  V

customer_reviews.title: Where was this earlier? Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great swaddle. Easy to use instructions and super convenient for any time of day/night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays put! Doesn’t come lose!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this swaddle so much!! Easy to use! The zipper is the best part!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby  Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing swaddle
customer_reviews.text: We love the versatility and how you’re able to have legs out if need be! Such an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality swaddle! My favorite part is that the swaddle grows with baby as there are additional snaps, also fabric is super soft . I’ll be ordering another one today!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this fabric! I love that it is very soothing and just snuggles the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We used the swaddle with our daughter. It allowed us to swaddle her with her legs out while in the swing and in the rock n play. It worked great! We wished it was available when we had our son.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is not consistent. I have two and there is a big difference on the same size.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this swaddle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needs to be swaddles to sleep- period. We have tried lots of different swaddles and she likes this one the best. It leaves plenty of room for her legs without bunching them up, while still keeping her arms swaddled. I also love that it can be used to transition out of swaddling or even with their legs out. The print is gorgeous and we have received so many compliments from visitors on it.
customer_reviews.author: K Douty

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swaddle! Beautiful print and worked well with my 8lb 20 inch long newborn. Only issue was my baby slid to the bottom by end of day.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mae

product_meta.title: embé 2-Way Starter Swaddle Blanket, 5-14 lbs, Diaper Change w/o Unswaddling, Legs in and Out Design, Warm Up or Cool Down 100% Cotton, 0-3 Months (Pink Clustered Flowers)
feature_bullets: THE WORLD'S ONLY LEGS IN AND OUT SWADDLE SACK! - Patented technology. No other arms in swaddler or sleep sack in the entire world can offer the versatility of legs in warmth, legs out cooling and heat dissipation to help keep your newborn baby girl or baby boy from dangerously overheating. USA Hospitals and Neonatal Intensive Care Units (NICU Baby) Preferred. Safe sleeping environment. SIZE: 5-14lbs, approx 0-3 months old. Swaddle blanket for girl. 0-3 swaddle sack for boy, gender neutral.

THE SAFEST SWADDLERS! - Safer than traditional burrito wrap methods. embé swaddle wrap sacks snuggle arms in, arms down, keeping infants from getting arms up, arms out, or hands up and startling awake. Safer alternative to loose muslin blankets or receiving blankets that can cover nose and mouth. No rise neckline collar keeps fabric secure in place. 3 adjustable swaddle lengths (small - medium - large) ensure it's never too long, eliminates loose fabric that can rise up or baby can sink into.

EASY SWADDLE DIAPER CHANGES WITHOUT UNSWADDLING - All our swaddle collections allow for effortless diaper changing, without the need to remove or unswaddle baby, so you don't disturb their precious sleep. Our revolutionary swaddle design keeps baby swaddled and snuggled during a diaper change, preventing hands from getting near their diaper. This keeps them asleep and napping. Simply unsnap at the chest and pull the leg pouch down for diaper access, making that midnight diaper change a breeze!

HIP HEALTHY SWADDLE! - embé's award-winning, best swaddles are designated "Hip-Healthy" by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute. Our generous heart-shaped leg pouch supports proper hip health and leg development. Arms only swaddle strap can be used legs out by babies with a pavlik harness, clubfoot boots and bar, brace, or spica cast. 100% NATURAL BREATHABLE CLASSIC COTTON - No Synthetics added. Water-based dyes. No Lead. No Phthalates. CPSC Tested. Vel Crowe.

WHY SWADDLE? - Tight swaddling mimics a mothers' womb, soothing babies with womb-like, snuggle warmth and swaddle security. Tighter is safer as loose fabric can become a sleep hazard. Better than a zip up swaddle or zippered sleepsack. embé newborn swaddle blanket is lite and versatile. Ready to swaddle upgrade in size? Try our Stage 2 Transition Swaddle Out, with arms in or arms out options.
